SEARCH
Package com.ts8t.objects

Class Node

java.lang.Object
com.ts8t.objects.Location
com.ts8t.objects.Node
public class Node extends Location
Author:
Rob Kempf

A Node is a Location on a road, often at an intersection. Each Node knows the a set of links that begin or end there. All Nodes are Locations, but not all Locations are Nodes.
